name: Space shooter mechanic
description:
A game made in 4 days for the Godot Wild Jam #53 !

Tutorial

In this game, you have to shoot at robots, but your gun is broken and warms up when you use it. The hotter it gets, the more damage you deal, but when it overheats, you have to repair it !

Have fun :D

Controls

ActionControlLeftA (or it's equivalent on your keyboard)
RightD (or it's equivalent on your keyboard)JumpSpace bar or UP arrowShootLeft clickInteractE (or it's equivalent on your keyboard)
